data.name: Slender Threads: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1116480/Slender_Threads/


About the Game

"Discover scenic Villa Ventana, the hillside community of empty stores and emptier people." Not the ideal backdrop for a bestselling novel, but as every writer knows, inspiration can strike in the unlikeliest of places. Within hours of Harvey Green's arrival, that inspiration takes the form of foreboding dreams, impossible coincidences, and hidden motives that set Harvey on the path to uncovering a chilling, fateful truth.



Slender Threads is a point-and-click thriller adventure. Guide Harvey through Villa Ventana as nefarious, unseen forces exert increasingly more sway over him and the town's residents.

* Encounter and interact with a vast assortment of eccentric characters with inscrutable intentions.
* Solve a sequence of challenging puzzles as you draw ever closer to the source of the town's dark influence.
* Bring to light the origins of the region's uncanny existence.

data.short_description: Slender Threads is a point-and-click thriller adventure where unseen forces bind the fate of an unremarkable traveling salesman to the peculiar town he one day arrives in.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.8 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 700M series or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.8 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 700M series or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
